com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection

Class AndroidBluetoothConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection.AbstractConnection
      • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection.AndroidBluetoothConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAndroidBluetoothConnection

    public class AndroidBluetoothConnection
extends AbstractConnection
implements IAndroidBluetoothConnection
    Android Bluetooth connection class.

    need extend AbstractConnection and implements IAndroidBluetoothConnection

    Author:
    Jay Lee

      • connected

        public void connected(BluetoothSocket socket,
             BluetoothDevice device,
             boolean isListenMode)
        Start the ConnectedThread to begin managing a Bluetooth connection
        Parameters:
        socket - The BluetoothSocket on which the connection was made
        device - The BluetoothDevice that has been connected
        isListenMode - true means is listen mode (Type II), false means in connect mode (Type I)

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: IAndroidBluetoothConnection
        close local android bluetooth connection, but the meter still in PCL mode.

        if want to power off meter, must call AbstractMeter.turnOffMeterOrBluetooth(int)

        call the method, only stop the local device(android phone) connection, not turn off local android bluetooth adapter.

        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface IAndroidBluetoothConnection

      • LeDisconnect

        public void LeDisconnect()
        close local android bluetooth LE connection, but the meter still in PCL mode.

        if want to power off meter, must call AbstractMeter.turnOffMeterOrBluetooth(int)

        call the method, only stop the local device(android phone) connection, not turn off local android bluetooth adapter.
